title: A Colorado dad says his 8-year-old is the youngest to scale El Capitan, but did they really climb it?
dc:creator: Salvador Hernandez
description: Joe Baker and his 8-year-old son, Sam, reached the top of Yosemite's El Capitan Saturday, now there are questions about whether the pair actually climbed the 3,000-foot rock.
content:encoded: Joe Baker and his 8-year-old son, Sam, reached the top of Yosemite's El Capitan Saturday, now there are questions about whether the pair actually climbed the 3,000-foot rock.

media:content.media:description: YOSEMITE NATIONAL PARK, CA - APRIL 11: Yosemite National Park is closed to visitors due to the coronavirus, Covid 19. El Capitan at sunrise on April 11, 2020. Animals roam the park without having to worry about crowds of people. Madera County on Saturday, April 11, 2020 in Yosemite National Park, CA. (Carolyn Cole / Los Angeles Times)
media:content.media:credit: Carolyn Cole/Carolyn Cole/Carolyn Cole/Los Angeles Times
